name: @mfd/rbxdatastoreservice
description: RbxDataStoreService is a module that allows you to access roblox datastores from your Node.js applications.

scripts.postinstall:
echo "Thank you for installing RbxDataStoreService! 

For documentation, visit the official ROBLOX DataStore Documentation (https://developer.roblox.com/en-us/api-reference/class/DataStoreService)"
scripts.prepare-windows: npm install && npm run eslint && npm run build

author: nsg <nsg@mfd.com> (https://github.com/mfd-nsg)
